title: Communication Specialist
company_industry: Paper and Forest Product Manufacturing and Packaging and Containers Manufacturing
description:
**Job Description**
 Vi på Billerud tror att när vi har morgondagen i åtanke gör vi vårt bästa idag. Tack vare våra medarbetare är vi ett världsledande företag inom vår bransch av förnybara pappers- och förpackningsmaterial. Vill du uppnå din fulla potential och bidra till en hållbar morgondag? Bli en del av oss!
   

  

**Vi söker en driven Communication Specialist**
 Vill du ta nästa steg som kommunikatör med spetskompetens inom sociala medier i en global koncern? Då kan det här vara rollen för dig!
   

  

 Vi söker en passionerad Communication Specialist som älskar att skapa engagerande innehåll och vill vara med och långsiktigt stärka Billeruds varumärke gentemot interna och externa målgrupper.
   

  

 I den här rollen blir du en viktig partner till verksamheten och får chansen att utvecklas i en dynamisk miljö. Du kommer att planera, skapa, redigera och anpassa innehåll för våra digitala kanaler, inklusive intranät, webb, Instagram, Facebook och LinkedIn – och se till att allt publiceras med högsta kvalitet och genomslagskraft.
   

  

**I den här rollen ansvarar du för att:**
* Skriva och redigera texter på både svenska och engelska.
* Utföra enklare foto- och videoredigering samt grafisk design av material.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad kring algoritmer, trender och goda exempel avseende sociala medier.


**Du Kommer Också Att Arbeta Med Att**
* Stödja HR med kommunikation och employer branding-insatser.
* Säkerställa att Billeruds strategi, värderingar och varumärkesriktlinjer återspeglas i allt innehåll.
* Leda och implementera kommunikationsprojekt och aktiviteter.


 Tjänsten rapporterar till Senior Director Communication och är placerad på vårt huvudkontor i Solna, Stockholm.
   

  

 Vi sätter Safety First! Hos oss på Billerud ansvarar vi alla för att bidra till en säker arbetsmiljö. Läs mer om vårt Safety First initiativ här.
   

  

**Qualifications**
**För att lyckas i rollen som digital kommunikatör har du:**
* Relevant eftergymnasial utbildning inom kommunikation, marknadsföring eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Minst något års arbetslivserfarenhet inom kommunikation och/eller sociala medier, helst inom B2B.
* Praktisk erfarenhet av digital kommunikation och publiceringsverktyg för webb och sociala medier, gärna från en inhouse-roll i en organisation.
* Praktisk erfarenhet av content creation för både text, bild och video på svenska och engelska.
* Grundläggande kunskap i Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro) eller motsvarande.


**Personal qualities**
 Vi lägger stor vikt vid din personlighet och din förmåga att samarbeta. Som Communication Specialist kommer du att arbeta nära både kollegor inom kommunikation och övriga verksamheten. För att trivas och lyckas i rollen tror vi att du är en lagspelare som samtidigt är trygg med att arbeta självständigt. Du tvekar inte att be om tips och råd när det behövs och ser värdet i att dela kunskap med andra.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som är kreativ och har både intresse och förmåga att skapa engagerande storytelling, där berättelsens syfte alltid står i centrum. Rollen kräver också en hög grad av struktur och förmåga att hantera flera projekt samtidigt. Att planera effektivt och hålla deadlines är därför något vi värdesätter högt.
   

  

 Våra värderingar är centrala i vår verksamhet och vi tror att du som söker känner igen dig i våra värdeord: Värna om varandra och Vi håller det vi lovar.
   

  

**Contact**
 Vill du veta mer om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Pia Rosin, Senior Director Communication, pia.rosin@billerud.com.
   

  

 Frågor om rekryteringsprocessen hänvisas till Julia Åkerlund, Talent Acqusition Partner, på julia.akerlund@billerud.com
   

  

**Application information**
 För denna process ber att din ansökan både innehåller ett CV samt ett personligt brev som kortfattat motiverar ditt intresse för tjänsten.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan senast 1 januari 2025.
   

  

 Billerud är en jämställd arbetsgivare. Vi omfamnar mångfald och är engagerade i att skapa en inkluderande miljö för alla anställda och kandidater.
   

  

**Varför oss?**
* Du får jobba i ett internationellt kommunikationsteam som strävar efter att skapa bra och resultatdriven kommunikation till interna och externa målgrupper.
* En möjlighet att bidra till en mer hållbar framtid.
* Du får möjlighet att utveckla dina färdigheter i yrket och växa för att kunna ta större eller nya utmaningar inom koncernen.
* Prestationsbaserad bonus, tjänstepension och en rad olika förmåner enligt företagets policy.
* Möjlighet till hybridarbete enligt företagsstandard.


**Vår rekryteringsprocess innehåller:** 
 intervjuer, rekryteringstester, referenstagning, alkohol- och drogtest samt bakgrundskontroll.
   

  

**Do you want to help create a sustainable future through your work?**
 At Billerud, we are fully committed to reduce our and our customers carbon footprint by offering high-performance paper and packaging materials. We are convinced that the right solutions can be important tools to help fight climate change. That's why we see it as our responsibility to enable the best packaging choices, for a better tomorrow.
   

  

 Our proud history in the forestry and paper industry goes back more than 150 years. Since then, we’ve grown to what we are today: a world leading company in high-performing paper and packaging materials - passionately committed to sustainability, quality, and customer value. Our materials are the basis of packaging and paper products used by millions of people around the world, 24 hours a day, all year round.
   

  

 We serve customers in more than 100 countries through our three business areas Liquid Packaging Board, Paper and Paper Board. Our nine production units are located in Sweden, USA, and Finland and we have around 6,000 employees in 19 countries. Our annual turnover is approximately SEK 41.2 billion and the share is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm. At Billerud we always put safety first, care for each other, and do what we say.
   

  

**Join us in redefining sustainable packaging and drive meaningful change for a better tomorrow.**

title: GTM Manager
description:
**About Leya**
 Leya is working to empower lawyers and automate legal work. Our approach is to enable the lawyer of the future: a human-AI lawyer who's an order of magnitude more effective than a team of conventional legal professionals. The human-AI lawyer will iterate at the speed of their judgment, even in the most complex legal scenarios, and will out-smart and out-deliver the best pure AI system.
   

  

 You are joining an early-stage scale-up with exceptional product-market fit that thousands of lawyers use daily at global institutions such as Bird&Bird, Mannheimer Swartling, and Heineken. Backed by $37M in funding from top investors like Benchmark, Redpoint, and Y Combinator, Leya is a group of exceptional engineers, lawyers, and doers. Here, you will have infinite room to grow and rethink how truly worthwhile work gets done.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Join our team in Stockholm, London, or New York as a GTM Manager and work alongside highly motivated individuals from BCG, McKinsey, Baker McKenzie, and White&Case. Our Go-to-market team is known for its perseverance, entrepreneurial spirit, and relentless pursuit of making our clients win with AI. As part of our GTM team you will influence how lawyers engage with Leya’s products, driving growth and innovation across the legal industry worldwide.
   

  

 GTM at Leya includes identifying emerging market needs and trends and helping shape our products, recognizing the strategic needs of the world’s most important organizations, understanding how Leya can solve their challenges, and shaping the future structure of Leya's GTM motion.
   

  

 The GTM team's scope spans industries and geographies, focusing on new market expansion, strategic sales, and setting the blueprint, tools, and collaborative ways of working to enable us to scale even faster.
   

  

 Leya is leading the way in an unprecedented time, what we do one day can be obsolete the next. This requires extreme intuition, strategic minds, bold tradeoffs, and not least, grit. For the right person it’s equally challenging as it is rewarding, as we’re doing something every day worth recounting to future generations.
   

  

 What you will be doing:
   

  

* Independently manage the full sales cycle from initiation to close – assisting some of the largest corporates and law firms in the world to succeed in the age of AI
* Collaborate cross-functionally with product, engineering, and legal teams to ensure our platform aligns with client needs and continuing to develop it at the highest pace
* Build trusted relationships with key decision-makers and stakeholders, addressing their pain points with tailored solutions
* Deliver impactful product demonstrations and presentations to drive engagement and adoption.
* Contribute to the refinement of our account acquisition and management strategies and processes, documenting best practices to scale effectively.


 What Will Help You Thrive
   

  

* Have 3-5 years of experience in B2B GTM or sales, at a top tier management consultancy, law firm, or have a stellar academic or industry track record
* Are naturally curious, always seeking to learn, and view every challenge as a growth opportunity
* Possess extreme grit and determination, allowing you to weather setbacks and persist towards your goals
* Are driven by excellence, striving for greatness in everything you do
* Embody humbleness, always ready to learn from others and unafraid to admit when you're wrong
* Are deeply committed to our mission of changing the way legal work gets done, and have a genuine passion for global business development
* Possess an entrepreneurial spirit, with the mindset of a founder and the readiness to build our go-to-market team
* Are impact-driven, motivated to make a difference and continuously push the limits of what's possible


 What We Offer
   

  

* Career development opportunities in a rapidly evolving entrepreneurial environment.
* Direct collaboration with senior leadership and the opportunity to directly impact company growth and strategy.
* A collaborative, high-energy team environment where your ideas and contributions are valued and implemented.
* Competitive salary complemented with a transparent and highly competitive options program.
* Centrally located offices in Stockholm, London, and NYC, designed as a space for you to do your life's work.


 We founded Leya with the vision of giving lawyers the tools they deserve.
   

  

 We didn't build Leya for how law is practiced today; we built it for how it should be practiced tomorrow.

title: Serviceman till polisutbildningen på Södertörns högskola
description:
Arbetsplatsbeskrivning
   

  

 Är du redo för en större uppgift?
   

  

 Vi söker nu en serviceman till Serviceenheten, med placering vid polisutbildningen på Södertörns högskola. Hos oss kommer du tillsammans med engagerade och trevliga kollegor utvecklas och få erfarenheter för livet, samtidigt som ditt arbete bidrar till att öka tryggheten och minska brottsligheten i Sverige.
   

  

 Polismyndighetens ekonomiavdelning har som uppdrag att utforma och driva myndighetens strategiska styrning och uppföljning som fastställer vad myndigheten ska uppnå för resultat och effekter. Avdelningen fördelar ekonomiska medel för att verksamheten ska kunna nå beslutad riktning och följer upp att medlen används på ett effektivt och hållbart sätt.
   

  

 Serviceenheten har det samlade ansvaret för funktionerna fordonsservice, utbildningsservice till polisutbildningarna, internservice och drift av polisens utbildningsplats Sörentorp samt myndighetens fordonsförsörjning och interna trafiksäkerhetsarbete. I uppdraget ingår att samordna, utveckla och effektivisera verksamheten inom respektive ansvarsområde.
   

  

 Arbetsbeskrivning
   

  

 Servicemän vid alla polisutbildningarna jobbar nära tillsammans och arbetar också med att förbättra processerna kring utbildningsmaterialet. Du arbetar dagligen i flera olika IT-system. Under omväxlande arbetsdagar varvas administration med operativt servicearbete. Tyngre lyft och obekväma arbetsställningar förekommer i arbetet. Din placering kommer att vara vid polisutbildningen på Södertörns högskola, visst resande i arbetet kan förekomma, företrädesvis i närregionen, men även resor runt om i landet kan vid behov bli aktuellt.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifterna omfattar service inom områdena nedan:
   

  

* Uniformer, fordon och larm
* Passagehantering och övningsmiljöer
* Logistik och säkerhet
* Inköp/beställningar och provningar
* Service, reparationer samt destruktion av det polisiära utbildningsmaterial som hanteras och används vid respektive polisutbildning


 Kvalifikationer
   

  

 Detta är en möjlighet för dig som har:
   

  

* Godkänd gymnasieexamen eller motsvarande erfarenhet som arbetsgivaren bedömer som relevant för tjänsten
* Erfarenhet av arbete i närtid i för tjänsten relevant servicefunktion
* Svenskt utfärdat B-körkort för manuellt växlat fordon
* God datorvana t.ex. inom Office-paketet
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift


 Vi ser det som meriterande om du utöver ovan även har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av liknande servicearbete inom Polismyndigheten eller annan statlig verksamhet
* Arbetat i relevant servicefunktion inom högskola/universitet
* Gedigen erfarenhet och god kompetens av arbete med IT-baserade ärendehanterings- och/eller affärssystem
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta knutet till beklädnad/uniformer
* Erfarenhet av däckhantering
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med behörighetshandläggning
* Utökad körkortsbehörighet, ex. BE


 Personliga egenskaper:
   

  

 För att trivas i rollen så är det viktigt att du har hög servicekänsla och kunden i fokus. Du behöver ha god förmåga att kommunicera och då vi arbetar tätt tillsammans inom teamet och i samverkan med myndigheten så är det viktigt att du även har god samarbetsförmåga. Då arbetet många gånger är händelsestyrt så behöver du vara självgående, bra på att strukturera och prioritera bland arbetsuppgifterna samt noggrann även i stressiga situationer.
   

  

 Utöver det så har du förmåga att se hur din grupps arbete bidrar till helheten samt vilja att lära dig nytt och bidra till att utveckla och förbättra processerna.
   

  

 Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och personlig lämplighet.
   

  

 Kontaktpersoner
   

  

 Magnus Blom, Bemannande Chef
   

  

 magnus.blom@polisen.se
   

  

 Amanda Öström, HR-konsult
   

  

 amanda.ostrom@polisen.se
   

  

 Fackliga företrädare
   

  

 Saco-S Avdelningarna, nås via växeln 114 14 , Sofia Ask/Polisförbundet, tfn 010-563 87 10, Fackförbundet ST, nås via 114 14, Karna Tillheden/SEKO Polisen, tfn 010 561 66 27
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Anställningsform: Tillsvidare
   

  

 Arbetsort: Stockholm/Flemingsberg (Södertörns högskola)
   

  

 Arbetstid: Heltid, flextid
   

  

 Tillträde: Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Funktion: Serviceman
   

  

 Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) och besvara urvalsfrågorna. Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.
   

  

 Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället.
   

  

 Vi använder e-rekrytering för att effektivisera och kvalitetssäkra rekryteringsarbetet. Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Polisens rekryteringsstöd Visma Recruit.
   

  

 Har du skyddade personuppgifter, referenser eller liknande information som du själv bedömer som skyddsvärd rekommenderar vi att du kontaktar ansvarig HR-konsult innan du går vidare med din ansökan.
   

  

 Om du vill komplettera din ansökan vänder du dig till ansvarig HR-konsult.
   

  

 En anställning hos Polismyndigheten kan komma att inledas med en provanställning om sex månader.
   

  

 Polismyndigheten är Sveriges största myndighet. Vi erbjuder dig en arbetsplats som stimulerar till mångfald, kreativitet och personlig utveckling.
   

  

 Läs gärna om våra förmåner som anställd hos polisen på: polisen.se/erbjudande
   

  

 Vi bedriver vår verksamhet enligt vår värdegrund: engagemang, effektivitet och tillgänglighet. Som medarbetare inom polisen agerar du för likabehandling. Det är en förutsättning för rättssäkerhet, rättstrygghet och för polisens legitimitet i samhället. Som företrädare för polisen respekterar du allas lika värde och skapar förtroende för polisen.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om polisen och vår verksamhet på www.polisen.se
   

 polisen.se
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 Vi undanber oss samtal och mail från dig som vill sälja annons- och rekryteringstjänster.
   

  

 Sök jobbet
   

  

 Ansökan sker via polisens rekryteringsverktyg

title: Analyst/Associate, Financial and Operational Restructuring
company_industry: Financial Services and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**Analyst/Associate, Financial & Operational Restructuring** 




**Alvarez & Marsal** 




**Stockholm** 




  





 Companies, investors and government entities around the world turn to Alvarez & Marsal (A&M) for leadership, action and results. Privately held since its founding in 1983, A&M is a leading global professional services firm that provides financial advisory, business performance improvement and turnaround management services. When conventional approaches are not enough to create transformation and drive change, clients seek our deep expertise and ability to deliver practical solutions to their unique problems.
 



  





 With over 10,000 people providing services across six continents, we deliver tangible results for corporates, boards, private equity firms, law firms and government agencies facing complex challenges. Our senior leaders, and their teams, leverage A&M’s restructuring heritage to help companies act decisively, catapult growth and accelerate results. We are experienced operators, world-class consultants, former regulators and industry authorities with a shared commitment to telling clients what is really needed for turning change into a strategic business asset, managing risk and unlocking value at every stage of growth.
 



  





 A&M’s established European Financial & Operational Restructuring practice advises companies, investors and lender groups in complex restructuring processes to evaluate the risks and opportunities of a company’s business plan, manage short term liquidity pressure, stabilise financial and operational performance, assess restructuring options, be the lead financial advisor through a restructuring transaction and implement comprehensive profitability, working capital improvements and restructuring solutions in order to maximize outcomes for our clients. Working directly with company boards and management teams on behalf of our clients, A&M stabilises crisis situations, drives agreement between stakeholders and creates a stable platform to drive growth.
 



  





 As a result of our growth, A&M Nordics are recruiting ambitious
 **Analysts** 
 or
 **Associates** 
 to join our Stockholm team. The successful candidate will have the opportunity to build a career in advisory with the leading global name in Restructuring and to help & support our clients with the financial implications of high interest and high inflation environment and the inter-related economic, inequality and security emergencies resulting from it.
 



  





**As part of a select and highly skilled team you will have the opportunity to:** 



* Advise companies, investors, lenders or other stakeholders facing distressed situations by assessing Financial & Operational performance in relation to the capital structure in order to develop and implement a viable solution
* In close collaboration with C-suite Management, perform detailed financial analysis of business plans and cash flow projections, the underpinning key drivers of the business and quantify potential risks or opportunities in a short- to medium-term horizon in order to provide a balanced view on the plan which is used as starting point for stakeholder negotiations
* Evaluate restructuring options and advise on contingency planning ahead of negotiations for a distressed debt and / or equity transaction, including quantifying financial implications of key financing terms (In close collaboration with legal advisors) for both the company and other stakeholders such as lenders or shareholders
* Assist C-suite Management in preparation of business plans and the implementation of 13-week cash flow forecasting tools, including financial modelling, financial planning and business plan reporting
* Develop trusted relationships with key stakeholders in the Nordics and European Restructuring community through the delivery of value-added client engagements



  





**The person:** 



* Strong academic background with 1-3 years’ experience within Financial Advisory (M&A, Restructuring, Due Diligence, Valuation, Debt Financing etc.)
* Experience conducting quantitative and qualitative analyses combined with exposure to constructing fully integrated three-statement financial models and analysing financial underperformance.
* Solid understanding of fundamental accounting and finance
* Ability to build relationships within a team and with clients
* Fluent business level Swedish and English is essential
* Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint)

title: Project Leader AI [F/M/X]
description:
Job description
  
  

**Mission Description:**  

As a Project Leader AI, you will manage the end-to-end delivery of key digital and infotainment software projects. Your role will focus on ensuring that projects are delivered on time, within budget, with the optimal technical software architecture solution, and aligned with departmental objectives. Frequent reporting to C-level executives is a crucial aspect of this position, requiring strong communication skills and the ability to present project status and insights effectively. You will work closely with technical leaders and cross-functional teams to ensure successful project execution across various locations, including Sweden, China, and our software hub in Eastern Europe.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

**Project Planning & Execution:** Lead the planning, execution, and delivery of software projects within automotive digital and infotainment sectors from initiation through completion, ensuring adherence to timelines and budgets.
  
**Cross-functional Coordination:** Collaborate with technical teams, product development, and engineering to ensure smooth project execution and alignment with the overall strategy.
  
**Risk & Issue Management:** Identify potential risks and proactively manage issues to ensure that project milestones are achieved without disruption.
  
**Performance Monitoring:** Track project progress against defined KPIs and implement corrective measures as needed to ensure successful delivery.
  
**C-Level Reporting:** Prepare and present regular project updates and reports to C-level executives, ensuring transparency and alignment with strategic goals.
  
  

**Profile Requirements:**  

**Qualifications:**  

Strong and 10+ years of proven experience in leading software delivery projects, preferably within the automotive software, digital, or infotainment sectors.
  
Excellent organizational and communication skills.
  
Strong problem-solving abilities with a focus on delivering results.
  
Proven ability to communicate effectively with C-level executives and manage stakeholder expectations.
  
Experience in embedded systems, IoT, HMI development, automotive infotainment platforms, cloud services & integrations, data privacy, agile development, and DevOps.
  
3-5+ years’ experience within the specific domain (AI / GPT) of project management.
  
  

**Software Competencies:**  

Proficiency in one or more programming languages (e.g., Java, C++, Python) and experience with software development tools and frameworks (e.g., Git, Jenkins, Docker).
  
Strong understanding of cloud platforms, embedded systems, and/or automotive software.
  
At least 7 years of experience as a software developer.
  
At least 3 years of experience as a software product owner.
  
  

**Specific Requirements:**  

Driver’s license needed.
  
  

**Advantageous Experience:**  

Hands-on development of AI solutions.
  
Proven track record of managing and delivering successful AI or software products.
  
Passion for AI and staying current with the latest industry trends and developments.
  
Strong knowledge of machine learning (ML), deep learning (DL), natural language processing (NLP), and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure).
  
Proficiency in Python, R, and AI frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn).
  
Familiarity with MLOps practices, version control (e.g., Git), and CI/CD processes.
  
  

Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.
  
  

Who are we?
  
Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7500 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.
  
  

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:
  
  

**Brief Call:** Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!
  
  

Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!
  
  

**Case study:** Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.
  
  

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.
  
We look forward to meeting you!

title: SENIOR DEVOPS ENGINEER
description:
**Senior DevOps Engineer**
 As of September 2024, TeamEngine has joined forces with Board Intelligence, the London-based AI board software and advisory firm, to bring Boards all around the world the benefit of their combined products and geographic reach. Hence, whilst this role will work for TeamEngine you will be working with the wider Board Intelligence team.
   

  

 We have a strong in-office culture. Please only apply for this role if you're happy to be based 4-5 days per week in our lovely Stockholm office.
   

  

**The Opportunity**
 Are you interested in making a difference? To work for a tech-for-good company whose reason for being is to help all boards and leadership teams to be a powerful driver of performance and a force for good? Board Intelligence is on a mission to bring kindness and success together and to drive companies to think about what matters. We work with over 30,000 Chairs, CEOs, and board members to embed the discipline of focus into their organisations, and we’re helping a new board every day to focus on what matters. We are in it for the long term, come join us on this journey.
   

  

 As a DevOps Engineer at Board Intelligence in Stockholm, you’ll bring energy, proactivity, and a passion for staying ahead of AI-driven developments in the DevOps space. With expertise in Google Cloud and AWS, coupled with strong Terraform skills, you’ll play a pivotal role in building and automating scalable cloud infrastructure across multiple sites and providers worldwide. As the company experiences rapid expansion—through acquisitions and the integration of new tech stacks—you’ll be at the forefront of ensuring seamless scalability and innovation, enabling us to push into new countries and maintain our trajectory of exciting growth.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities Of The Role**
* Architect and deploy robust, multi-cloud systems across Google Cloud and AWS, ensuring scalability, reliability, and top-tier performance
* Take ownership of moving on-premise systems to the cloud, automating workflows, and fine-tuning hybrid setups for clients who need to stay partially on-prem
* Manage Kubernetes clusters, ensuring streamlined operations through provider-managed services while constantly improving efficiency and reliability
* Lead critical upgrades, patching, and cleanouts to de-risk legacy infrastructure and strengthen the business’s tech foundation
* Build infrastructure solutions that scale with the company’s rapid growth into new markets, integrating and automating diverse tech stacks acquired through acquisitions
* Establish best practices for CI/CD, infrastructure as code, and system performance monitoring, ensuring teams are equipped for high growth
* Work with engineering, product, and IT teams to align infrastructure goals with business needs, driving innovation and seamless integration.
* Keep up with AI-driven developments and emerging DevOps tools, ensuring the company stays on the cutting edge of technology.


**Requirements**
**What skills and experience you might have**
 We prefer to work with the best talent regardless of whether you are familiar with all of the tools that we use. We don’t need you to be familiar with everything on this list but experience in some or all of these areas will be useful and a willingness to dive in and learn the others, essential.
   

  

* Extensive experience designing and managing scalable, multi-cloud environments across Google Cloud and AWS, with advanced expertise in Terraform for infrastructure as code.
* Proven track record of leading cloud migration projects, including on-prem-to-cloud transitions, hybrid solutions, and automating infrastructure for scalability across multiple sites and providers worldwide.
* Deep expertise in Kubernetes, including optimizing and managing containerized workloads through providers at scale.
* Demonstrated ability to handle complex tech debt, driving critical upgrades, patching, and risk mitigation with a business-focused approach.
* Proactive, hands-on problem solver with senior-level experience in identifying, diagnosing, and resolving infrastructure challenges independently.
* Strong understanding of modern DevOps practices, including automation, optimization, and scalability for high-growth, acquisitive organizations with diverse tech stacks.


**Application**
 Please note that interviews will be held ongoing so do not hold off sending in your application.
   

  

 Does this sound like something for you? Join our team!

title: Cloud Solution Architect
description:
Antingen är du redan arkitekt eller molnutvecklare med en stark önskan att bli arkitekt? Det viktigast är dock att du är passionerad och brinner för moderna lösningar som utnyttjar molnets alla positiva egenskaper. Vi söker just nu lösningsarkitekter till vårt team i Stockholm.
   

  

**Teamet och inriktningen**
 Teamet fokuserar på att hjälpa våra kunder forma arkitektur och arbetssätt för att nyttja molnet effektivt för att lösa de behov som finns i verksamheten. Det kan handla om övergripande arkitekturprinciper och mer teknisk arkitektur för specifika lösningar. Teamet specialiserar sig också på modern applikationsintegration och kommunikation mellan lösningar, främst med API och event-plattformar. Vi och våra kunder arbetar med alla stora molnplattformar - AWS, GCP och Azure.Kunduppdragen kommer att vara i Stockholm, samtidigt som en global organisation som Capgemini ger dig möjlighet att samarbeta, utvecklas och växa med kollegor och kunder världen över.
   

  

 I teamet specialiserar vi oss för att kunna ge stöd till våra kunders cloud och integrationsbehov i ett anta områden, t.ex:
   

  

* Applikationsdesign och arkitektur i molnmiljöer
* Integrationer för molnbaserade tjänster
* Cloud DevOps och DevSecOps
* Lösningsarkitektur


 Med både bredd och djup erbjuder vi stora möjligheter att bygga vidare på dina arkitekturfärdigheter, dela kunskap och utveckla dig tillsammans med skickliga kollegor i teamet.
   

  

**Din profil**
* Du har tidigare erfarenhet av utveckling av lösningar i public cloud eller molnbaserade containermiljö.
* Du är lösningsarkitekt med erfarenhet inom Azure, AWS eller GCP och kan bevisa det med motsvarande certifiering
* Du har god kommunikations- och presentationsförmåga i kombination med förmåga att leda och vilja att ta ansvar för kundleveranser
* Du skriver och talar flytande svenska då det används i det dagliga arbetet


**Meriterande**
* Back-end erfarenhet inom följande: Python, Node.js, Django och Spring
* Front-end erfarenhet inom följande: Angular, React.js, vue.js och jquery
* DevOps – Till exempel Ansible, Terraform, Jenkins, Kubernetes


  

  

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas**
 Vi erbjuder dig en dynamisk arbetsmiljö med andra molnspecialister inom Capgemini. Här får du möjligheten att arbeta i projekt med nationella och internationella kunder. Du har friheten att utveckla dig själv med hjälp av Capgeminis egen utbildningsplattform som bl.a. ger dig tillgång till all molnrelaterad utbildning. Berätta om dina ambitioner och vi ser fram emot att hjälpa dig att nå dem.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
* En positiv arbetsmiljö med starkt fokus på innovation och kompetens. Du kommer att arbeta med många av de senaste tekniktrenderna och vara omgiven av duktiga kollegor.
* På Capgemini blir du en del av en global organisation med starkt kundfokus, samarbetskultur och möjlighet till kontinuerligt lärande och utveckling.
* Vårt Cloud & Application Integration-team i Stockholm består av drygt 10 kollegor som arbetar som cloud och integrations-specialister hos våra kunder.
* Capgemini har varit en dominerande aktör inom arkitekturområdet sedan 90-talet, med vårt eget ramverk Integrated Architecture Framework (IAF) och vi bidrar även aktivt till vidareutvecklingen av TOGAF.
* Vi har ett aktivt, globalt arkitektforum med lokala undergrupper där du kan dra nytta av globala och lokala experter inom arkitektur och även bidra med din egen erfarenhet.


**Våra värderingar**
* Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team spirit, Modesty and Fun


**Ansökan**
* Vi rekryterar löpande till denna roll, så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.


  

  

**Om Capgemini**
 Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2023 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro.
   

  

**Get The Future You Want |** 
 www.capgemini.com

title: Senior Infrastructure Engineer
description:
**Job Title:** 
 Senior Infrastructure Engineer
 



**Locations:** 
 London, Oslo, Stockholm, Tallin, Madrid, Barcelona, Lahore
 



**Working Model:** 
 Hybrid, with a 3 days in the office requirement
 



**Benefits:** 
 Private Health Care
 



  





**About Us** 




 Gelato has built the world's largest and most global network for on-demand production of customized items e.g. t-shirts, wall art, mugs, books, hoodies, and cards. We support a new wave of e-commerce entrepreneurs and the global shift towards local and more sustainable production.
 



 In many ways, we at Gelato are rethinking how digital fabrication of customized products can be done on-demand. Just imagine what will happen when we add 3D printing capabilities to this global service. We are already empowering thousands of e-commerce entrepreneurs to grow and scale their businesses.
 



  





**Gelato Technology** 




 We own no physical production assets, nor servers, instead our asset is a cloud based connectivity platform that enables world-class on-demand production for e-commerce platforms and applications. This engineered platform needs to provide our customers access to more than 130 production partners in 32 countries and includes production plate design, routing to an appropriate partner, finally linking to logistics’ systems for delivery to the consumer. All this in 72 hours and reaching more than 5 billion people and potential consumers in a smarter, faster, and greener way.
 



 The employed technologies range from backends using PHP and GoLang to mobile apps built natively or with hybrid technology, running on cloud services and with a modern CI/CD pipeline. Designing highly-available, fault-tolerant, cost-effective, scalable systems is our passion. We are using TDD, BDD, DDD principles and patterns, and agile methodology. Designing public API for millions of people, integrating with world-class third-party systems, and solving complex engineering problems (Graph, CAP, etc) are only a small glimpse into the tasks.
 







**About The Position** 




**What you will do** 



* **Innovate and Strategize:** 
 Design and implement strategic initiatives that propel Gelato's infrastructure forward, ensuring alignment with our rapid growth and innovation objectives.
* **Automate Everything:** 
 Be an Infrastructure as Code (IaC) champion, driving automation to streamline processes and enhance efficiency.
* **Champion Reliability and Efficiency:** 
 Optimize our cloud infrastructure, ensuring maximum uptime, performance, and cost-effectiveness.
* **Collaborate for Success:** 
 Partner with Engineering to craft resilient cloud applications. Automate deployments, implement robust monitoring and alerting, and solidify our DevOps practices through IaC.
* **Embrace Availability:** 
 Contribute to our culture of continuous availability by participating in the on-call rotation, demonstrating your commitment to platform excellence.
* **Harness the Power of AI:** 
 Explore the use of AI to modernize our cloud production platform, unlocking new levels of insight and automation.
* **Optimize Through FinOps:** 
 Promote a FinOps mindset, ensuring we make conscious, data-driven decisions to optimize cloud costs.



**Who you are** 



* **Education & Experience:** 
 You hold a bachelor's or master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline, backed by at least 5 years of hands-on experience in cloud infrastructure, automation, and DevOps.
* **Cloud Mastery:** 
 You possess deep expertise in major cloud service providers (AWS, Azure, GCP) and a thorough understanding of cloud best practices. You're passionate about building scalable and efficient SaaS platforms.
* **DevOps Toolset:** 
 You have proven expertise in essential cloud DevOps automation tools like Kubernetes (K8s), Terraform, and Helm. Your experience drives seamless CI/CD pipelines, configuration management, and containerization for our SaaS environment.
* **Technical Fluency:** 
 You have working knowledge of programming languages like Python and Go, as well as modern platform development and infrastructure automation.
* **Problem-Solving & Collaboration:** 
 You are an exceptional problem solver, able to navigate complex challenges in fast-paced environments. Collaboration is key to your success as you work to deliver high-quality SaaS products within our production platform.



  





**What it’s like to work at Gelato** 




 We are a customer-obsessed team with the ambition to change the world by connecting technology to the printing industry and making it much more sustainable. Everyone who joins our team must feel genuinely intrigued and motivated by our mission. We expect a lot. We are a driven team with big goals, so we seek individuals who are genuinely passionate about their work and possess an entrepreneurial spirit. Our culture is unique and we live by our values, so it's worth learning more about our culture and how we work before presenting your application.
 



  





 At Gelato, we pride ourselves on our global presence with 16 offices worldwide, fostering a dynamic and diverse work environment. Rooted in a culture that values collaboration, creativity, and camaraderie, we actively cultivate a company culture that thrives on shared experiences. We encourage team members to embrace this culture by working from our inspiring office spaces at least three days a week, allowing for meaningful connections and collective growth.
 



  





 Lastly, we ask that you please upload your CV in
 **English** 
 , regardless of which country you are applying from.

title: Senior Project Manager - Data & Analytics / Scrum Master (m/f/d)
description:

title: Senior Cloud Architect
description:
- We're an award-winning Google Cloud partner. We're the experts in transforming businesses and shaping the future of cloud technology. Their dedication and expertise elevate every project we undertake together. Ready to join an elite team? Apply for our Senior Cloud Architect position and become part of something exceptional!


Is this not the right position for you? Don’t worry, we have plenty of opportunities! Check out our Career page

title: AI Standardization Researcher
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity**  

Ericsson’s 6G vision remains pivotal for transforming society and business into the 2030s through sustainable, efficient, and secure communication services. In recent years, Artificial Intelligence (AI) has emerged as a catalyst for innovation within the telecommunications sector as an integral part of making the networks smarter and meet the new challenges and expectations of the 2030s. As the 6G development is progressing into a more concrete phase of definition and standardization we are looking for researchers that would like to help us define and standardize the 6th generation AI-native networks that will help to enhance the future by driving the cyber-physical world beyond the 2030s.

  

At Ericsson Research, we are at the forefront of AI technology and leverage new advancements in ML and data science workflows to support the development of new communication solutions and standards. Furthermore, we pride ourselves in providing a supportive team environment where individual contributors are given the maximal opportunity to excel and develop their technical skills. Currently, we are seeking multiple junior and senior researchers to collaborate with us in maintaining our industry leadership in defining and standardizing the 6th generation AI-native networks.

 **Shape the future of global connectivity with us—be at the forefront of 6G innovation!**

 **What you will do**

* Design, implement, and evaluate AI/ML solutions in 6G standardization
* Working closely in a research team driving 6G standardization
* Research on the emerging AI technologies and conceptualization of their applications in AI-native networks
* Develop the direction and trajectory of MLOps ways of working
* Work with internal simulators and contribute to their future development
* Work across compute and external cloud platforms
* Collaborate with experts in various telecom domains, some who necessarily do not have a background in AI
### **The skills you bring**


* MSc or PhD in AI, data science, computer science, engineering physics or in a related field


As we are hiring multiple researchers, we expect you to have experience with several but not necessarily all the below requirements:

* Strong general understanding of AI techniques such as deep learning, reinforcement learning, generative AI, probabilistic modeling, stochastic optimization, or graph theory
* Strong practical programming skills in Python and ML frameworks such as PyTorch, Jax, and/or TensorFlow
* Experience with MLOps tools such as MLFlow and Kubeflow
* Experience with using Docker containers and container orchestration tools for ML-based research such as K8s
* Experience with developing workflows for validating ML-driven code
* Willingness to learn new technologies and openness to work in adjacent areas
* Experience in telecommunications, networking, and signal processing
* Good communication skills in written and spoken English
* Positive attitude, creativity and the ability to independently formulate and solve problems
* Ability to translate high-level objectives into detailed tasks and actionable steps
* Active reading, critical thinking, and analytical reasoning
* Strong personal drive and strong focus on the tasks at hand
* Ability to explain AI techniques and its applications to people without an AI background

  

We are looking for candidates who enjoy daily cross-functional collaboration and interaction with other skilled researchers and collaboration with people having diverse backgrounds and competences. Teamwork is a necessity and a foundation of the way we  

work. For senior position, leadership experience combined with substantial professional experience is required.

**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


The position is based in Kista, Sweden.


Last day to apply: February 7th, 2025.


We are reviewing applications on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible.

  

Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

**Recruiter:** Miroslaw Cos

title: Cloud Operation Specialist
description:
Cloud Operation Specialist
 
 Brinner du för molnteknologi och vill arbeta i framkanten av innovativa lösningar? Söker du en dynamisk arbetsmiljö med möjlighet att påverka kunders molnstrategier och säkerställa driften av molnbaserade lösningar? IT-Total söker nu efter en Cloud Operation Specialist till vårt team!
   




**Om rollen** 

 I rollen som Cloud Operations Specialist kommer du vara teamets expert på Azure och hjälpa oss att nyttja plattformen maximalt i våra tjänster. Du kommer få jobba med design, prestandaoptimering, felrapportering samt implementationer och säkerställa att vi alltid levererar en tjänst med hög tillgänglighet. Vi arbetar primärt med Microsofts-produkter, men det kan även förekomma andra Cloudleverantörer AWS, GCP och tillsammans arbetar vi med att leverera de bästa lösningarna för våra kunder.

 Vi söker dig som har en gedigen teknisk bakgrund och erfarenhet av att arbeta med molnbaserade plattformar. För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du har:

description:
**Role:** 
 Solutions Architect
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm, flexible/hybrid
 



  





 As a Software Solutions Architect, you will lead the design and architecture of software solutions across our organization. This role requires a blend of deep technical expertise and a comprehensive understanding of architectural principles, ensuring our software is robust, scalable, and aligned with business goals.
 



  





 You will play a vital role in translating complex business challenges into innovative technical solutions by creating forward-thinking architectures that address both current and future needs.

 - Hands-on Development: Engage in coding, reviewing, and testing critical components requiring advanced programming skills. Use programming expertise to prototype new ideas and concepts.
 



 - Systems Integration: Design and manage the integration of new applications with existing systems, ensuring seamless communication between diverse systems and components.

 - Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

title: Solution Manager
description:
Do you have a strong technical background, passion for problem-solving and want to join and contribute to Trapets growth journey? Then this is the role for you! Our mission is to help businesses with the technology and knowledge needed to fight financial crime. We are now looking for a
 **Solution Manager** 
 to join our Stockholm team.
   

  

**About Trapets**
 Trapets is a market leader in providing cutting-edge RegTech SaaS solutions for the financial industry to prevent financial crime and to assure regulatory compliance. Trapets’ services simplify advanced monitoring of customers’ daily operations – from initial and ongoing customer screening to detecting money laundering, terror financing and fraud. Trapets also provides services for trading surveillance including detection of insider trading and market manipulation.
   

  

**About The Role At Trapets**
 You will work directly with our customers in large projects and offer consulting services including process and workflow review/development, implementation and deployment strategies, software training and technical guidance as well as industry expertise to ensure customers are maximising the value from their investment in Trapets technologies.
   

  

**Role Responsibilities**
* Drive successful projects from start to finish, while ensuring that any gaps are uncovered and to ensure best possible solution for our customers challenges.
* Ensure that the customer is setup correctly with Trapets systems and develop innovative ways of engaging and adding value to the customers business processes through Trapets Instantwatch platform and relevant services.
* Stay up to date on industry and regulatory trends as well as continuously enhance our processes to make them more efficient and adaptable to different solution needs.
* Create documentation such as internal guidelines, customized training material etc.


**Qualifications And Experience Required**
* Technical interest and experience of integration projects with API and complex data management.
* A consultative mindset with pedagogical skills in training and guidance of customers.
* Good financial markets knowledge ideally with some AML regulation experience.
* Excellent communication and presentation ability for a variety of stakeholders, as well as fluent English and Swedish language skills.
* Attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Strong problem solving and analytical skills.


**What We Offer**
 Trapets company values
 *Engagement* 
 ,
 *Trust* 
 ,
 *Growth* 
 and
 *Together* 
 are our guiding stars to achieve our mission to help businesses with the technology and knowledge needed to fight financial crime. We offer:
   

  

  

* A hybrid workspace with a modern office in central Stockholm.
* 50% Remote work Policy.
* Frequent office breakfasts.
* A wellness allowance of 5 000 SEK per year.
* Private medical health care insurance.
* Pension plan.
* 30 days of holidays per year.
* Regular after-work events including off-site activities.
* The ability to truly impact and contribute to the growth of Trapets.
* Endless learning opportunities via supportive and talented colleagues.


**Interested?**
 If you believe you are the right candidate for this exciting career opportunity, please apply today.
   

  

 If you have questions and/or thoughts, contact Sara Bäckman by e-mail sara.backman@trapets.com
   

  

 For more information about Trapets: www.trapets.com
   

  

 Trapets is a software company that provides products and solutions for financial crime prevention, including anti-money laundering (AML), know your customer (KYC), and market surveillance. Founded in 2000 in Sweden, Trapets has grown to be one of the Nordic market leaders focusing solely on financial crime prevention through technology for decades.

title: Technical Product Manager - Shared Components (Real Time Communication)
Developer Support Engineer for Data Calling
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 As a Developer Support Engineer, you will be responsible for enhancing the developer experience by continuously improving our reference implementations, sample apps, and documentation, while providing top-notch support to our clients' developers. You'll troubleshoot customer integrations of our SDKs and APIs, track FAQs, and identify patterns that highlight potential SDK improvements. Our SDKs use WebRTC technology, making it easy to add real-time, in-app voice and video calling to our clients' websites or apps.
   

  

* Handle and analyse third-line support inquiries to ensure our FAQs remain relevant.
* Help keep our developer documentation up-to-date and user-friendly.
* Build reference implementations and sample apps to simplify the integration of our voice, video, and verification SDKs.
* Collaborate closely with other engineers to stay informed about important updates and new releases.
* Focus on quality assurance and provide first-class support to developers.
* Communicate effectively with clients, ensuring their technical issues are resolved promptly and clearly.
* Conduct QA testing of SDKs on mobile devices to ensure optimal performance and usability.


**Requirements**
* Degree in IT, engineering, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
* High proficiency in English, particularly in writing.
* Strong communication skills, with experience in handling customer support.
* Experience in app development or relevant development roles.
* Strong understanding of the development process and effective communication with developers.
* Interest in voice and video calling technologies.


**Good to have**
* Familiarity with Android and iOS application development (Kotlin, Swift).
* Experience of using tools such as Datadog and Kibana for monitoring systems and performing root cause analysis through detailed log and metric exploration.
* Previous experience in a similar support role.
* Experience with voice and video calling.
* Familiarity with WebRTC technology, IP networks or telecom networks.
* Experience in manual and automated QA testing of SDKs on mobile devices.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Information Security Manager
description:
Informationssäkerhetsspecialist
 
 Är du redo att vara den avgörande kraften som säkerställer att företag och organisationer skyddar sina mest värdefulla tillgångar? Som informationssäkerhetskonsult är du experten som tar ledningen för att guida våra kunder genom den komplexa världen av informationssäkerhet. Från att identifiera risker och bedöma konsekvenser till att implementera standarder och leda förändringsprocesser.
   

**Mot ett IT-tryggare Sverige – ett företag i taget .**




****Om rollen:****
 Som informationssäkerhetskonsult är ditt uppdrag att hjälpa våra kunder förstå vad informationssäkerhet är, varför det är viktigt och vilka konsekvenser det kan leda till om man inte förstår och följer de krav som ställs. Vilken mognadsgrad man har och vilka åtgärder som är mest prioriterade. Vad har man för hot, vilka risker skapar de och vad blir konsekvensen om dessa faller ut.
   

  

 Detta görs genom informationsinventering, informationsklassificering och riskanalyser för att komma fram till vilka skyddsåtgärder som behöver implementeras. Det fortsatta arbetet är att föreslå och driva förändringsprocesser samt säkerställa efterlevnad av standarder och regulatoriska krav.
   

  

 Du genomför workshops för att öka medvetenheten och kunskapen om informationssäkerhet. Du aktivt främjar ett systematiskt och kontinuerligt arbete med informationssäkerhet och ger rådgivning samt presentationer för ledningsgrupper angående relaterade frågor och initiativ.
   

  

 Du är ansvarig för implementering av standarder såsom ISO 27001 och för att
 
 säkerställa överensstämmelse med relevanta regelverk för att bibehålla en hög nivå av informationssäkerhet.
   





****Vad krävs för att lyckas i rollen?****
 Vi letar efter dig som har djup förståelse och stort intresse av informationssäkerhetsområdet och är en god kommunikatör och inspiratör i informationssäkerhetsrelaterade frågor. Du besitter teknisk förståelse och har förmåga att granska helheten och säkerheten i komplexa miljöer.  I möten med kollegor och externa parter agerar du konsultmässigt och kommunicerar på ett tydligt och professionellt sätt.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer:**



* Omfattande kunskap inom informationssäkerhetsområdet
* Erfarenhet av CISO-rollen
* CISSP-certifierad
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med regelverk och standarder
* Erfarenhet av förändringsledning
* Erfarenhet av arbete med ISO 27001
* Akademisk utbildning
* Erfarenhet av informationsklassificering



  





**Varför kommer du att trivas på IT-Total?** 




 IT-Total föddes ur idén att vara det bästa företaget för medarbetare inom sin bransch, därför välkomnar vi dig till en arbetsplats som ger dig glädje, stimulans och möjlighet att växa inom det område du brinner för. Vi är en innovativ arbetsgivare som satsar på din framtid och jobbar i teknikens framkant med ett högt säkerhetstänk. Med säkerhetsprövade medarbetare och säkerhetsklassade lokaler- och datahallar garanterar vi trygghet och integritet för våra kunder.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder:** 




 🥪 En himmelsk fredagsfrukost med kollegorna
 



 🌍 Hybrid arbetsplats
 



 💑 Roligt på jobbet - allt från träning till resor och spelkvällar
 



 🍏 Ett välfyllt lager av frukt, nötter, gudomligt kaffe från en Kunglig Hovleverantör om så önskas.
 



 🍰 Fredagsfika tillsammans
 



 🏡 Ett stenkast till både shopping på Mall of Scandinavia och natursköna Brunnsviken som är perfekt för löpning och lunchpromenader
 



 ✔ Goda och trygga anställningsvillkor.
 



 🙌 Frihet att styra din egen utveckling och ditt eget arbete, vi tror på "Work life balance"
 



 👩🏽‍🤝‍🧑🏼 Kollegor i världsklass som bryr sig 💛
 



 🚗 Goda parkeringsmöjligheter
 



 🏌️‍♂️ Generöst friskvårdsbidrag
   






 Här kan du även läsa mer om våra värderingar
 







**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan i formuläret nedan.**
**Har du några frågor gällande tjänsten?**
 Tveka då inte att höra av dig till ansvarig rekryterare:
   

 Kajsa Jordansson, Talent Acquisition Manager, IT-Total
   

 Mail: kajsa.jordansson@it-total.se

title: SE Consultant
description:
**Become a Driving Force for Our Customers' Success!** 




  





 As a
 **SE Consultant** 
 you will play a crucial role in our company by bridging the gap between our technical solutions and the unique needs of our customers. In this position, you will be instrumental in convincing potential customers of the value and benefits of our products and services.
 



  





  





**Your job** 



* Consulting and implementation support for our customers on processes, control and optimization in all SRM topic areas
* Specification, configuration, test and usage management in cooperation with SRM consultants of the respective project team
* Management or collaboration in internal and presales / customer projects
* Dedicated customer care (Key Account Consulting)
* Conducting value driven solution demonstrations and technical/security-related presentations
* Proactively transferring knowledge and conducting trainings and workshops
* Supporting partner management during the ramp-up of new partners
* Calculating and presenting customer ROI
* Providing technical support during lead generation and marketing events



  





  





**Your Profile** 



* Completed degree in Business Administration, Business Informatics, or a comparable qualification
* Experience in Procurement or Supply Chain Management
* Initial experience in using and selling cloud services, standard software (SaaS), or eCommerce projects
* High IT affinity and a solid understanding of cloud solutions in the procurement environment are advantageous
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product management, engineering, and marketing, to ensure solutions align with customer requirements and market trends.
* Strong presentation and public-speaking abilities, capable of delivering compelling demonstrations and technical pitches
* Positive attitude, communicative, well-organized, and an excellent team player
* Excellent Swedish and English language skills. Another Nordic language would be a plus



  





  





**We offer you** 




 Become part of the Onventis cloud platform for buyers and suppliers. A dynamic environment with flat hierarchies, fast decision-making processes and innovative development projects with creative freedom are included!
 


* Opportunity to develop in an exciting industry in a company with rapid international growth
* A modern and exciting working environment at the Epicenter in the citycenter of Stockholm
* Competitive salary, health contribution, travel allowance & company pension scheme
* Friendly and ambitious colleagues
* Culture of trust, great freedom under responsibility
* Combine the benefits of remote work with in-office teamwork, giving you the flexibility to balance personal and professional life effectively



  





  





**Join Us!** 




 ​
 **It’s time to meet you!** 




 Apply online or send your application with your salary expectations and the earliest possible starting date to the following e-mail address:
 **recruiting@onventis.de** 




  





 If you have any questions, please call us at +49 (0) 711 686875-0.

title: Samordnare inom IT- säkerhet till digitaliseringsenhet hos kund
description:
I rollen ansvarar du för att planera och genomföra säkerhetshöjande åtgärder och utveckla IT-säkerhetsstrategier anpassade efter verksamhetens behov. Du stöttar verksamheten i IT-säkerhetsfrågor, analyserar hot, hanterar incidenter och arbetar med kontinuitetsplaner.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
* Leda och samordna säkerhetshöjande aktiviteter
* Utveckla och implementera IT-säkerhetsstrategier
* Genomföra riskanalyser och säkerhetsgranskningar
* Samverka med interna och externa aktörer
* Omvärldsbevaka och hantera IT-säkerhetsincidenter
* Fungera som sakkunnig i IT-säkerhetsfrågor vid upphandlingar


**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som vill organisera, bygga upp och driva IT-säkerhetsarbetet inom den offentliga sektorn. Vi ser gärna att du sedan tidigare har erfarenhet av att jobba med IT-säkerhetsfrågor i verksamhetssystem och IT-infrastruktur. Vi tror att du som söker har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet och stort intresse av systematiskt IT-säkerhetsarbete, inklusive incidenthantering, riskanalys, och kontinuitetsplanering.
* Praktisk erfarenhet inom IT-säkerhet och operativt IT- arbete antingen som systemadministratör eller som it-säkerhetssamordnare eller motsvarande profession inom flera av områdena Central infrastruktur, Cloud, nätverk, verksamhetssystem eller klient.
* Erfarenhet av säkerhetsfunktioner i Microsoft 365, Azure, SIEM-verktyg, samt sårbarhetsanalyser och pen-tester.


**Meriterande är** 
 certifieringar såsom CISSP, CASP+ eller motsvarande.
   

  

 Rollen ställer stora krav på initiativtagande och relationsskapande. Du är lyhörd, prestigelös och trivs både med att samarbeta med olika intressenter samtidigt som du driver initiativ självständigt.
   

  

**Om Wise IT**
*Wise IT är experter på kompetenslösningar inom IT. I en snabbföränderlig värld och med teknikdriven utveckling arbetar vi med att säkra konkurrenskraftig IT-kompetens. Det gör vi genom att erbjuda våra medarbetare utmanande uppdrag hos intressanta uppdragsgivare, där vi alltid ser till varje medarbetares fulla potential. Människan har en självklar plats i en framtida teknikutveckling, och genom att inkludera fler i IT-branschen och skapa en mer jämställd rekrytering utmanar vi en traditionell bransch och förändrar framtiden för företag och individer. Wise IT är en energifylld arbetsplats med härliga kollegor, ett öppet klimat och stora möjligheter till utveckling! Vi tror att människor presterar bäst då man får göra det man är riktigt bra på och vi lägger stor vikt vid vår företagskultur som grundas i våra värderingar passion, samarbete, ansvar och mod som vi tillsammans tagit fram.*
*Vi tycker det är viktigt att man mår bra och har kul på jobbet; därför är hållbarhet och hälsa saker vi värdesätter högt. Vi erbjuder så klart friskvårdsbidrag och har även ett flertal initiativ kopplat till CSR såsom samarbeten med Mentor, Röda Korset och gymnasieskolor för att nämna några.*
*Wise IT är en del av Wise Group som är noterade på Nasdaq OMX SmallCap sedan 2015.*

title: Transport and Infrastructure expert (Cat. II)
description:
**NTU International A/S** 
 is leading a consortium for the implementation of the EU funded project called:
 **Technical Assistance to Mobilise Stakeholders around Global Gateway Priorities in Nigeria** 
 and is searching for experts to support the core team during the implementation of this project.
 



 The
 **primary objective** 
 of this contract is to support the effective mobilisation of stakeholders (Member States, development financial institutions, public and private sectors) around the Global Gateway priorities in Nigeria, including, but not limited to, digital economy, transport and health as well as cross cutting thematic such as innovative financing, business climate and governance, through structured engagement and strategic intelligence gathering.
 



**Project Duration:** 
 The indicative start date is 03/03/2025 and the period of implementation of the contract will be 729 Day(s) from this date (indicative end date: 02/03/2027).
 



**Location:** 
 Abuja, Nigeria.
 



**Transport and Infrastructure expert (Cat. II):**




***☝️ Qualifications and skills:***



* Advanced degree in transport engineering, civil engineering, urban planning, public policy, or a related field.
* Strong analytical abilities in assessing transport infrastructure, investment opportunities, and regulatory environments.
* Familiarity with EU policies on sustainable infrastructure development and financing mechanisms is essential.
* Excellent communication skills to engage a range ofstakeholders effectively.
* The ability to build strong professional networks within Nigeria and the EU.
* Ability to manage complex, multi-stakeholder projects, with proven skills in planning, coordinating, and executing strategic roadmaps and engagement activities.
* Proficiency in English is required.



***☝️ General professional experience:***



* Minimum of 6 years of experience in transport infrastructure, investment advisory, or public-sector consultancy focused on infrastructure development, preferably with experience in emerging markets or in an African context.
* Experience working within or alongside EU programs or international development agencies, especially in advisory roles relating to policy and investment.
* Demonstrated experience in organizing high-level stakeholder engagement, public-private partnerships, and intergovernmental cooperation events.



***☝️ Specific professional experience:***



* Proven experience in identifying and assessing investment opportunities within transport infrastructure, including roads, railways, and ports.
* Expertise in analyzing economic, regulatory, and technical aspects of transport infrastructure, with a track record of identifying barriers to entry and proposing mitigations.
* Experience in developing strategic roadmaps for transport and infrastructure projects, detailing actionable steps for public and private sector involvement.
* Direct experience in facilitating missions, dialogues, and policy alignments between Nigerian and European entities, with a deep understanding of crossborder regulatory requirements and trade policies



 If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply and upload your CV via LinkedIn or sent to recruitment@ntu.eu. Due to the large number of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
 



 ⏰ !!!!! Deadline: 20th of January, 2025.

title: Solution Architect SAP
company_industry: Paper and Forest Product Manufacturing and Packaging and Containers Manufacturing
description:
**Job Description**
 Billerud, a leader in the Paper and Pulp industry, is embarking on a strategic transition to a new Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system SAP S/4HANA. Our aim is to optimize our business processes, improve cross-departmental information flow, and enhance our data management capabilities. It is thanks to our employees that we are a world-leading company within the field of renewable paper and packaging materials. Do you want to realize your true value and work for a sustainable tomorrow? Join us!
   

  

**We are now looking for a Solution Architect SAP to join our team.**
 In this role, you will collaborate closely with internal staff, project teams, and external vendors to ensure the successful implementation and integration of our SAP solutions.
   

  

 You will be part of our newly started Global Shared Application Team with the purpose to maintain and deliver Applications used globally in Billerud Europe and Billerud North America.
   

  

 As a Solution architect you will be overall responsible for our SAP solutions within your specific SAP area, for example Warehouse, Production, Procurement, Finance etc working in close collaboration with business and our external SAP implementation partner.
   

  

**Your Main Tasks Will Be**
* Collaborating with internal staff, project teams, and external vendors to understand business requirements and processes, including dependencies across various domains.
* Comprehending the information architecture and ensuring it aligns with business needs.
* Adhering to the company's architecture principles for the target solution architecture, raising and deciding on any deviations according to the governance model.
* Ensuring the target solution supports multiple regions and business units.
* Documenting the target solution architecture in line with given standards.
* Understanding the current system landscape and integrations to support our transition.
* Evaluating and implementing features from SAP's latest releases, including “Feature Pack Stack” (FPS) for RISE in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition.
* Understanding the entire solution end-to-end, including high-level business processes and their integration with SAP technology.
* Working as an SAP expert, understanding SAP processes end-to-end and how modules fit together.
* Collaborating with Enterprise Architects, Business Process Leads, and various SAP Analysts and Subject Matter Experts.


 This role is based at one of our offices/production units - Solna, Gävle, Frövi, Karlsborg, Gruvön or Skärblacka. The role will require some travelling within Sweden.
   

  

 At Billerud, we put Safety First. Together we take great pride in our responsibility to contribute to a safe work environment. Please read more about our Safety First initiative
   

  

**Qualifications**
**To succeed in this position, we believe you have:**
* Degree in Computer Science, IT, Business Administration, Logistics, or related fields.
* Expert knowledge in SAP, especially SAP S/4HANA MM, IM, and EWM.
* Solid experience of SAP implementations, including 2+ full-cycle projects.
* Strong SAP project and Application Maintenance Management experience, preferably in manufacturing or related industries.
* Experience with both custom-built and ERP systems, and a strong understanding of their integration challenges.
* 10+ years of implementing SAP.
* Functional/technical proficiency with at least 2 full cycle SAP Implementations.
* Proficiency in logistics processes and integration with procurement, manufacturing, and maintenance.
* Cross-module expertise to design end-to-end solutions.
* Fluent in English with excellent communication and presentation skills.
* Meritorious: SAP certifications (S/4HANA SD, MM, EWM) and knowledge of MES systems.


**Personal qualities**
 For us, personality is important. To succeed in this position, we believe you are:
   

  

* Able to work in a cross-functional environment and have strong analytical skills
* Excellent in communication with different resources and roles, both technical and business staff.
* A good team player with strong logical and reasoning skills.
* Willing and available to travel if required.
* Committed to high-quality project and maintenance delivery. Enjoy working in a global environment.


 Our values are central in our business and we believe that you recognize yourself in: We care for each other and We do what we say.
   

  

**Contact**
 If you want to know more about the role you are welcome to contact recruiting manager Katarina Kopkin, Senior Manager Global Shared Applications, Katarina.kopkin@billerud.com or Ann Josefsson, Senior Director Global IT Applications, at ann.josefsson@billerud.com
   

  

 If you have questions about the recruitment process, you are welcome to contact Alice Lundberg, Talent Acquisition Partner, at alice.lundberg@billerud.com
   

  

**Application information**
 Welcome with your application no later than January 12th.
   

  

 Billerud is an equal opportunity employer. We embrace diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and candidates.
   

  

**Why us?**
 Want to be part of a big SAP S4Hana Greenfield implementation and upcoming maintenance organization?
   

  

 An opportunity to contribute to a more sustainable future
   

  

 Development and career opportunities
   

  

 Performance-based bonus, occupational pension and a number of different benefits according to company policy.
   

  

 Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard.
   

  

 Our recruitment process will contain: Interviews, recruitment test, references, alcohol- & drug tests and background check.
   

  

**Do you want to help create a sustainable future through your work?**
 At Billerud, we are fully committed to reduce our and our customers carbon footprint by offering high-performance paper and packaging materials. We are convinced that the right solutions can be important tools to help fight climate change. That's why we see it as our responsibility to enable the best packaging choices, for a better tomorrow.
   

  

 Our proud history in the forestry and paper industry goes back more than 150 years. Since then, we’ve grown to what we are today: a world leading company in high-performing paper and packaging materials - passionately committed to sustainability, quality, and customer value. Our materials are the basis of packaging and paper products used by millions of people around the world, 24 hours a day, all year round.
   

  

 We serve customers in more than 100 countries through our three business areas Liquid Packaging Board, Paper and Paper Board. Our nine production units are located in Sweden, USA, and Finland and we have around 6,000 employees in 19 countries. Our annual turnover is approximately SEK 41.2 billion and the share is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm. At Billerud we always put safety first, care for each other, and do what we say.
   

  

**Join us in redefining sustainable packaging and drive meaningful change for a better tomorrow.**

title: Elektroingenjör HW
description:
### **JOB DESCRIPTION**



Dags för nya kollegor? Vi söker dig med några till flera års erfarenhet som elektronikingenjör inom hårdvaruutveckling.



Som person tycker du utveckling, felsökning och konstruktion av elektronikhårdvara är det bästa att jobba med. Du har djup förståelse för komponenter, PCB-design och Elektronik-cad i något av de ledande systemen.



Vi på Sigma Industry Evolution är ingenjörsföretaget som erbjuder konsulter till både de mindre och större företagen.


### **BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**


* Du har en högskole- eller civilingenjörsexamen inom elektro eller motsvarande.
* Erfarenhet av att konstruera elektronikhårdvara
* Erfarenhet av certifiering
* Erfarenhet av schematics/design

### **PREFERRED ADDITIONAL SKILLS, PERSONAL TRAITS AND EXPERIENCE**
